_comment_camera_indices: List of USB camera device indices. Try [0] for single camera, [0, 1] for two cameras
_comment_resolution: Camera resolution [width, height] in pixels. Common: [640,480], [1280,720], [1920,1080]
_comment_fps: Frames per second. Higher values = smoother but more CPU usage. Range: 15-60
_comment_person_detection: Enable person detection using HOG-SVM (CPU intensive)
_comment_motion_threshold: Motion sensitivity threshold (0-255). Lower = more sensitive. Typical: 20-30
_comment_motion_min_area: Minimum pixel area for motion detection. Filters small movements. Typical: 500-2000
_comment_recording_duration: Seconds to continue recording after motion detected
_comment_max_storage_gb: Maximum storage for recordings in gigabytes. Old recordings auto-deleted when exceeded
_comment_recordings_path: Directory path for saving video recordings
_comment_logo_path: Path to logo image file (PNG, JPG, BMP). Leave empty to disable. Supports transparency (PNG)
_comment_logo_scale: Logo size as fraction of video frame (0.0-1.0). Typical: 0.1-0.2
